医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
先兆子痫和 COVID-19 在孕妇中具有病理生理学相似性在 COVID-19 大流行期间，尤其是在疫苗问世之前，人们敲响了警钟：孕妇感染的 COVID-19 重症病例与先兆子痫之间可能存在相关性，先兆子痫是一种以孕妇高血压（高血压）为特征的疾病，尿液中蛋白质含量高（蛋白尿）。它可能会给母亲和婴儿带来危险的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Preeclampsia-and-COVID-19-share-pathophysiological-similarities-in-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Preeclampsia-and-COVID-19-share-pathophysiological-similarities-in-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90a10264-0eaa-456a-9e66-732979076a85 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 20:15:20 -0500 Preeclampsia and COVID-19 share pathophysiological similarities in pregnant women
肠道微生物组的变化可能预示类风湿性关节炎的发作《风湿病年鉴》在线发表的研究表明，由于遗传、环境或免疫因素，肠道微生物组构成的变化与临床上明显的类风湿性关节炎的发病有关，而这些人由于遗传、环境或免疫因素而有患病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Changes-in-gut-microbiome-could-signal-onset-of-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Changes-in-gut-microbiome-could-signal-onset-of-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18317af6-d3e6-4236-9b58-233d5b4a5ffa Thu, 07 Nov 2024 20:10:06 -0500 Changes in gut microbiome could signal onset of rheumatoid arthritis
运动可减轻产后抑郁和焦虑的严重程度《英国运动医学杂志》发表的一项对现有证据的汇总数据分析发现，纯锻炼计划有助于降低新妈妈“产后忧郁症”的严重程度和患严重临床抑郁症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Exercise-reduces-severity-of-postpartum-depression-and-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Exercise-reduces-severity-of-postpartum-depression-and-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29651f15-e9b8-4628-a4ad-a8ff90d079f0 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 20:05:21 -0500 Exercise reduces severity of postpartum depression and anxiety
做出历史性承诺，保护全球儿童免受暴力侵害今天，100 多个政府做出了结束儿童暴力的历史性承诺，其中 9 个政府承诺禁止体罚 — — 这一问题影响到每 5 个经常在家中的儿童中就有 3 个。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Historic-pledges-made-to-protect-children-from-violence-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Historic-pledges-made-to-protect-children-from-violence-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e37646a9-ab83-4e1c-9506-16d9814ca940 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 20:01:49 -0500 Historic pledges made to protect children from violence worldwide
Mpox 疫苗分配目标是 9 个非洲国家mpox 的获取和分配机制 (AAM) 已为非洲地区受当前 MPOX 激增严重打击的 9 个国家分配了初步 899 000 剂疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Mpox-vaccine-allocation-targets-9-African-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Mpox-vaccine-allocation-targets-9-African-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8679fc40-4e10-4925-99a9-a7cc6d3fd47b Thu, 07 Nov 2024 19:59:25 -0500 Mpox vaccine allocation targets 9 African countries
世卫组织呼吁在 COP29 上采取以健康为中心的气候行动在 2024 年巴库联合国气候变化大会 (COP29) 召开之前，世界卫生组织 (WHO) 呼吁结束对化石燃料的依赖，并倡导以人为本的适应和恢复能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/WHO-calls-for-health-centered-climate-action-at-COP29.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/WHO-calls-for-health-centered-climate-action-at-COP29.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cba37367-4365-4384-ab91-bbd956e34bf9 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 19:56:44 -0500 WHO calls for health-centered climate action at COP29
了解胰腺癌发生和治疗中的肠道微生物失衡胰腺导管腺癌 (PDAC) 被认为是最致命的癌症之一，估计五年生存率约为 10%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Understanding-gut-microbial-imbalance-in-pancreatic-cancer-development-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Understanding-gut-microbial-imbalance-in-pancreatic-cancer-development-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9c79528-6131-4211-9c4d-de88337b0c52 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 14:02:21 -0500 Understanding gut microbial imbalance in pancreatic cancer development and treatment
研究表明训练有素的免疫力如何与心血管疾病相关当想到免疫系统时，大多数人会想到 B 细胞和 T 细胞，以及如何训练它们识别病原体，防止再次感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Research-shows-how-trained-immunity-links-to-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Research-shows-how-trained-immunity-links-to-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=047da0a1-9ce3-4bba-9ea7-c1a587863a4d Thu, 07 Nov 2024 13:47:56 -0500 Research shows how trained immunity links to cardiovascular disease
新的抗生素耐药菌株可能正在亚洲蔓延一项新的研究显示，一种致命的新型耐抗生素细菌菌株可能会在亚洲广泛传播，从而导致严重疾病，这对全球公共卫生构成重大挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria-strain-may-be-spreading-across-Asia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria-strain-may-be-spreading-across-Asia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61963664-0200-4c5a-9d40-7ce3dc535f2c Thu, 07 Nov 2024 13:26:35 -0500 New antibiotic-resistant bacteria strain may be spreading across Asia
立陶宛科学家开发出改善血液循环的非侵入性装置下肢血液循环受损是老年人常见的健康问题，也是糖尿病最突出的并发症之一，即糖尿病足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Lithuanian-scientists-develop-non-pressive-device-to-improve-blood-circulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Lithuanian-scientists-develop-non-induced-device-to-improve-blood-circulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f82c993a-1b71-4a56-b742-8d5a1585340c Thu, 07 Nov 2024 12:37:00 -0500 Lithuanian scientists develop non-invasive device to improve blood circulation
